label: Influx Flux ì¡°íšŒ(ë…¸ë“œì „ìš©)
info: HTTP/API ì‚¬ìš© ì•ˆí•¨. influxdb in ë…¸ë“œ + Fluxë§Œ ì‚¬ìš©

query:
from(bucket: "5603a3eb-89e2-4e15-8cbb-60750c6588d3_raw")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "1" or r._field == "2" or r._field == "3")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

name: Flux: buckets()
// raw ë²„í‚·ì˜ ì¸¡ì • ëª©ë¡
meta ë²„í‚·
ê³ ìœ í•œ ì¸¡ì •/í•„ë“œ/íƒœê·¸ ê°’ë“¤ í™•ì¸
Flux ì¿¼ë¦¬(meta json)
SQL ë¹Œë“œ(ì—…ì„œíŠ¸)
func:
const raw = msg.payload[0]._value; // Influx meta JSON ë¬¸ìì—´
msg.query = `
WITH j AS (
  SELECT jsonb_array_elements(($$${raw}$$)::jsonb->'RawDataColumns') AS r
)
INSERT INTO influx_tag (key, tag_id, tag_name, tag_type, meta, updated_at)
SELECT r->>'DataId', r->>'DataId', r->>'DataName', r->>'DataType', r, now()
FROM j
ON CONFLICT (key)
DO UPDATE SET
  tag_id=EXCLUDED.tag_id, tag_name=EXCLUDED.tag_name,
  tag_type=EXCLUDED.tag_type, meta=EXCLUDED.meta, updated_at=now();
`;
return msg;

build SQL (get_tags)
replyTo(JSON)
viewer/tags (retained)
func:
const rows=Array.isArray(msg.payload)?msg.payload:(msg.payload&&msg.payload.rows)||[];
msg.topic='viewer/tags'; msg.payload=JSON.stringify({rows,ts:Date.now()}); msg.retain=true; return msg;

name: build SQL (get_hist)
replyTo(JSON)
build SQL (live last per tag)
func: msg.query="SELECT DISTINCT ON (tag_name) tag_name, value, ts FROM influx_hist ORDER BY tag_name, ts DESC;"; return msg;

name: viewer/live/* (retain+dedupe)
func: const rows=Array.isArray(msg.payload)?msg.payload:[]; const last=context.get('last')||{}; rows.forEach(r=>{const tag=r.tag_name; const t=new Date(r.ts).getTime(); if(!last[tag]||t>last[tag]){ last[tag]=t; node.send({topic:`viewer/live/${tag}`,payload:JSON.stringify({tag_name:tag,ts:r.ts,value:Number(r.value)}),retain:true}); }}); context.set('last',last); return null;
